dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 17, 2005 1:59 PM
To: admin@caledonian-nv.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Caledonian NV <admin@caledonian-nv.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com, abuse@ev1.net
Date: Thursday, March 17, 2005, 5:12:41 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement

===8<==============Original message text=============== This correspondence
serves as an official notice, pursuant to Section 512 of the United States
Copyright Act of 1976 (also known as the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of
1998 (DMCA)), of illegal use of material, copyrighted by Dataworld BV, SE
number: 34132972, on the following
website(s):

- -- CUT --

http://www.zoophiliasex.info/ (hosted by "ThePlanet.com")

http://www.excitedhorses.com/ (hosted by "EV1.net")

http://www.excitedhorses.com/acceso.php?id=&trace= (signup page)

We will contact Visa, MasterCard and AmEx international if this client isn't
terminated immediately!

- -- CUT --

Dataworld BV, SE number: 34132972 has not given the user of the above
domains, or any individual affiliated with the owner, permission to make
these photographs and images available at the mentioned website(s).

Pursuant to Section 512 of the Copyright Act, we demand that you immediately
cease and desist from infringing upon Dataworld's copyrighted materials.
See United States Code, Title 17, Section 512 (c)(3).

You must remove the material that is in question immediately.  If you do not
remove these copyrighted materials, we will initiate legal action to protect
the interests of our client.

This correspondence serves as notice regarding the wrongful use of
copyrighted materials and places you in a position of having actual
knowledge of copyright violations.

Please note that the standard encompassed in the DMCA is whether the online
service provider has actual knowledge of any infringement, or is aware of
any facts or circumstances indicating an apparent infringement.

To be eligible for any limitations on infringement liability under the DMCA,
you must adopt and reasonably implement a policy of terminating accounts of
subscribers who are repeat infringers.

Your cooperation in this matter is appreciated and I hope we can resolve
this matter without resort to litigation.

If you have any question, please do not hesitate to contact me at (+45) 33
70 15 26

Kind regards,
Dataworld Customer Care


===8<===========End of original message text=========== -----BEGIN PGP
SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCOeF2vK/XpJs6oyURAn4LAKCSagCTP+W88OB3MOI4hJnpjnTTQQCeJv+q
0nEdjnDZ2YZ4sRWVO2DXhSY=
=83e5
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
